titleStmt.title: SII 14.229: original edition by A. S. Ramanatha Ayyar
No. 229. (A.R. No. 318 of 1908.) KURUVITTUṞAI, NILAKKOTTAI TALUK, MADURAI DISTRICT. ON THE NORTH WALL OF THE CHITRARATHAVALLABHA-PERUMĀḶ TEMPLE.

summary.p: This order was issued when the king was seated in the seat Pāṇḍiyarājaṉ in the Aḷagiyapāṇḍiyaṉ hall in the palace at Śōḻāntaka-chaturvēdimaṅgalam in Pāgaṉūrkūṟṟam and the 11th year quoted in the sixth line of the record was the year in which it was issued. Śiddhakuṭṭi-Mādhavaṉ alias Śōḻamuttaraiyaṉ, the kiḻāṉ of Māṅgāḍu in Māṅgāḍu-nāḍu, a subdivision of Puliyūr-kōṭṭam, a division of Toṇḍaimaṇḍalam had endowed some lands to the temple of Tiruchchakrattāḻvār in the village in the 2nd year, apparently of this king himself, but as a portion of them was not in the enjoyment of the temple as tax-free dēvadāna the king rectified this defect on a representation made by his officer Kāliṅgarājaṉ. It is stated that the lands had been reconstituted into a new village called Kulaśēkharamaṅgalam from the 2nd year itself from which it can be inferred that a Pāṇḍya king named Kulaśēkhara flourished at this time. A channel called Parākramapāṇḍiyappērāṟu is also mentioned.

div.head: A
div.p:
svasti śrī . tirumaṭantaiyum jayamaṭantaiyum tiruppuyaṅkaḻi linitiruppa Irunilamum perumai Eyta Eṇṭicaiyuṅ kuṭai niḻaṟṟa Irunilamum perumai Eyta maṉnava rellām vaṉtiṟaaiñca marapile varu maṇimuṭi cūṭit teṉkumari mutalākiya tiraikkaṭale Ellaiyākap pārmuḻutuṅ kayalāṇai parantu ceṅkoluṭaṉvaḻara maṉnnaya virasiṅhāsanattu Ulakamuḻutuṭaiyārroṭum viṟṟiruṉ
taruḻiya māmutal matikkulam viḻakkiya komutaṟ koccaṭaiyapanmarāṉa tiribhuvanaccakkara vattikaḷ śrīvallavatevar pākaṉūrk kūṟṟattu coḻāntakaccaturvetimaṅkalattu viṭṭaruḻina koyilil Uḷḷālai Aḻakiya pāṇṭiyan kūṭattu paḷḷikkaṭṭil pāṇṭiya rājanil Eḷuntaruḷi Iruntu ceyyat tiruvāya moḻintaruḻinapaṭi . pākaṉūr kūṟṟattu coḻāntakac caturvvedimaṅkalattu
tiruccakkarattāḻvārkku toṇṭaimaṇṭalattu puliyūrkoṭṭattu māṅkāṭṭunāṭṭu māṅkāṭu kiḻāṉ cittakuṭṭi mātavaṉāna coḻamuttaraiyan coḻāntakaccaturvedimaṅkalattu sabhaiyār pakkal kācu kuṭuttu vilaikoṇṭu kuṭutta pramāṇappaṭi viḻakkamaṅkalattu talaivayalukkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyap perāṟṟukku meṟkum muvāyi
ranallūr kalkuṭikaḷukku viṭṭa puṉcaikku vaṭakkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyan kallaṇaikku kalliṟakkum kaṟkaḻattukku kiḻakkum vaikaiyāṟṟukku teṟkum Ivellaikku Uḷpaṭṭa kollai nilattu paḻampāṭakappaṭi muṉpu tevatāna Iṟaiiliyāka Iṭṭa nilam paṉniruveli yum śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum maṭaviḻākamummāka viṭṭa nilam Aiyveliyum vaikai yāṟṟukku vaṭa
karaiyil vilaikoṇṭu Iṟaiili Iṭṭa nilam Añce Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Āka nilam Irupattiraṇṭey Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum śrīkulacekaramaṅkalameṉnum tirunāmattāl Iraṇṭāvatu mutal tevatāna Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭu nupavittu vārā niṉṟa teṉṟum Innilattil vaṭakaraiyil Iṟaiili Iṭṭanilam Añcey Oru māvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Ittevaṟku ceravallāmai
yāl Innilam patiṉoṉṟāvatu mutal māṟit tiṟappākki Innilattukkut talaimāṟu teṉkarai yil Āḻvār tevatānamākat tiṟappāy Iṟuttu varukiṟa nilattile Aiñcey Orumāvarai Araikkāṇiyum muṉpu Iṟaiili Iṭṭa nilattukku covāka Iṭappeṟaveṇu meṉṟum śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum maṭaviḷākamummāka Iṭṭa nilam Aiveliyil muveli Ittevaṟkuc ceravallāmaiyil māṟit tiṟappātti nikki ninṟa niṟnilam Iru
veliyum śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum tirunantavanamum maṭaviḷākamumāka Iṭappeṟa veṇumeṉṟu kāliṅkarājaṉ namakkuc connamaiyil tiruccakkarattāḻvārkku tiruppaṭi māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka viḻakkamaṅkalattu talaivayalukkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyap perāṟṟukkum meṟkum muvāyiranallūr kalkuṭikaḷukku viṭṭa punceykku vaṭakkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyaṉ kallaṇaikku kalliṟakkum kaṟkaḻattukku
kiḻattukkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyap perāṟṟukku teṟkum naṭuvupaṭṭa celkālāy varukiṟa nilattu melpakka maṭaiyap paḻam pāṭakappaṭi nilam paṉniruveliyum Innilattoṭu maṭaiya vaṭakarai Iṟaiyili māṟit tiṟappāna nilattukkut talaimāṟu celkālāy varukiṟa nilattil nilam muṉṟaraiyum taricu vacakkip payir ceyyalāku nilattu nilam Oṉṟarai yey Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Āka nilam patineneḷe Orumāvarai
ye Araikkāṇiyum śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum tirunantavaṉamum tirumaṭaviḷākamum nilam Iruveliyum Āka nilam pattoṉpate Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Ivvūril curukki veṟa mutalākkik kulacekamaṅkala meṉṉum piyarāl yāṇṭu patiṉoṉṟāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭomeṉṟu tiruvāymoḻintaruḷiṉār . Ivai Aṇṭanāṭṭu perumaṇalūr mantiri tirumalai Uṭaiyāṉāṉa Uttaramantiri Eḷuttu . Ivai miḻalaikkūṟṟattu kiḷakūṟṟu koḷuvaṉū
ruṭaiyāṉ kaṇapuravaṉ kuvalaya cantiraṉāṉa kumaṇarājaṉ Eḷuttu ..

div.head: B
div.p:
yāṇṭu patiṉoṉṟāvatu tevatāṉa Iṟaiyili nilai niṉṟa nilattukku Uḷvari . pākaṉūrk kūṟṟattu coḻāntakac caruppetimaṅkalattu tiruccakkarattāḷvārkku tiruppaṭi māṟṟuḷḷiṭṭu veṇṭum nimantaṅkaḷukku Iṟuppatāka toṇṭaimaṇṭalattu puliyūrk koṭṭattu māṅkāṭṭu nāṭṭu māṅkāṭukiḻāṉ cittakuṭṭi mātavaṉāṉa coḻakamuttaraiyaṉ coḻāntaka
ccaturvetimaṅkalattu sabhaiyār pakkal kācu kuṭuttu vilaikoṇṭu kuṭutta pramāṇappaṭi nilam viḷakkamaṅkalattut talaivayalukkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyapperāṟṟukku meṟkum muvāyiranallūrk kaṟkuṭikaḷukku viṭṭa puṉcekku vaṭakkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyaṉ kallaṇaikku kalliṟakkum kaṟkaḻattukkuk kiḻakkum parākkiramapāṇṭiyap perāṟṟukku teṟkum naṭuvupaṭṭa nilattu melapakka maṭaiya muṉpu tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāka Iṭṭup
payirc ceṉṟu varukiṟa nilattup paḻampāṭakappaṭi vaṭakaraiyila muṉpu Iṟaiyili Iṭṭa nilam Aiñce Oru māvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Ivvāḷvaārkku ceravallāmaiyil Innilam patiṉoṉṟāvatu mutal māṟit tiṟappākki Innilattukku talai māṟu tekairaiyil Iṟaiyiliyāṉa nilattukku cervāka tiṟappāy Iṟuttu varukiṟa celkāl nilattu Iṭṭa nilam muṉṟaraiyum taricu vacakkip payircceyyalā
m nilattu Iṭṭa nilam Oṉṟa ye Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Āka nilam patiṉeḻe Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum śrīkoyilum tirumuṟṟamum tirunantavaṉamum tirumaṭavaḻāka mummāka Iṭṭa nilam Aiveliyil nilainikka Iṭṭa nilam Iruveli Ākap paḻampāṭakappaṭi Iṭṭa nilam pattoṉpateya Orumāvaraiye Araikkāṇiyum Ivvūril curukki śrīkulacekaramaṅkalameṉṉum tirunā
mattāl veṟu mutalākki yāṇṭu patiṉoṉṟāvatu mutal tevatāṉa Iṟaiyiliyāy nilai niṉṟamaikku Ivai puravari tiṇaikkaḻattu mukaveṭṭi miḻalaik kūṟṟattu veḷ maṅkalamuṭaiyāṉ veḻāṉa Āḻiyuṅkaiyyaṉ Eḻuttu ... Ivai Aṇṭa nāṭṭup peru maṇalūr man śrīvallava Uttaramantari Eḻuttu .

div.head: B
div.p: This record is the uḷvari relating to the transaction registered in the previous inscription, and it is specifically dated in the 11th year of the king.
